author: cardano4climate
title: Cardano4Climate Community Hub
description: It's time for Cardano's impact on Climate Change to be measurable. A global HUB needs to connect local challenges & mission-driven solutions
solution:
Fund for paid subscriptions & incentives
Remunerate core team to grow impact of community
Provide incubation fund support to C4C community
experience: A global community of over 150 members, grown in 3 months around communication channels & a shared vision. 8 active core team members.
